snippet.title: Global Soldiers. Part 1 : When there's no money to hire John Mullins.
snippet.description:
Well...let's see what we got here. You play some unnamed soldier in the duty of some unknown corportion travelling to Iran. You get caught by the enemy and have to make it out of prison to fulfill your mission (which is so random, you wouldn't believe it: Escape the prison, steal a hard disk, make it to the haeadquarter, chase the boss ..)  

Technically this is another poor Call of duty clone with no special abilities. You have 2 different types of enemies, 3 guns to choose from and 4 of the same-looking boring levels. If you're in for some slow-paced action (because the game is everything else than fast) this one is for you. Personally I didn't like it much. 
But then again I'm not too much into army-shooters anyway..
